TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Peru, title = Peru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru} }

S.FORM: Peru hya' ga cyux maki' tay 10 00 S, 76 00 W na Nan-Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,285,216 sq km (maki' tay 20ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,279,996 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 5,220 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 30,741,062. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 18.80% , lhlahuy hya' ga 53%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 28.20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Lima. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Pedro Pablo Kuczynski, aring ryax 28 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Pero hya' ga cyox maki' tay 10 00 S, 76 00 W na Nan-Meco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,285,216 sq km (maki' tay 20ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,279,996 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 5,220 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 30,741,062. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 18.80% , lhlahoy hya' ga 53%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 28.20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Lima. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Pedro Pablo Koczynski, aring ryax 28 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2016 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
